author: Henry
title: Tokenized Property Investment DApp
description: $200 Trillion in the real estate market is currently inaccessible to many millions of willing investors, we can solve that with blockchain

assessments.note: The proposal has not considered the structure of the existing residential real estate market and so adoption would be almost impossible, unless they could convince major players in the mortgage and real estate business to adopt cryptocurrency as payment and settlement. So without addressing those concepts the proposal would not be likely to be implemented, thus not address the challenges.

I can see the passion and drive in the proposers but the project seams alot bigger than what the team vould handle in a short amount of time. Theres no metrics as for stages of development and how much of the funds get used on each step to create the solution. Another issue is the widespread adoption of ADA is not matured there on a institutionalized level and across the nation to bring in key investors, institutions and even securities. The idea could narrow the approach to a achievable goal in which the platform can grow along the key players needed to get there as the years pass. This would be interesting starting from Africa and perhaps with tiny homes movement bringing along sustainability and growth in that area to start given that is probably in the next years will have a whole system that will embrace Cardano, will have the ADAS, and institutional level will be onboard into adopting this proposal.
very competitive space littered with failed attempts any successful attempt would need to launch an ICO and have sizable liquidity

As mentioned above, the proposal graphic seems to be aimed at Multi-Level marketing approach to adoption, without saying so. That they do not mention the mortgage industry or fees for converting crypto to fiat for owners to pay down mortgages, tells me they are not thinking deeply enough

I see the passion and vision to get this through right from the get go, but a narrowed down approach to apply the solution to a small area as a case study need to occur to see the advabtages and disadvantages as well as the opportunities and the cracks in the projrct could be. When dealing with property, people and the system is much more complex to applied solutions. More careful consideration on the fact that the whole population doesnt know what ADAs are, what can blockchain do or how to get into that ecosystem. Therefore the approach should be focused on areas where mass adoption will be a reality in the next couple of years.
it is a complex topic and IMHO it seems a little lite on deeper content to deliver a scope for the 50k USD requested or detailed deliverables

The proposal talks about using 60% of funds for salaries. With no details (time/mmonths/rates/numbers. And as mentioned completely misses the mortgage industry in their picture, In the write up they say they are focused on graphics. This is evident. But commercial issues are ignored.

A more clear outline of the plan, funds and stages need to be communicated as well as the key metrics used to highlight those. More clarity on what the end result will look like and how is the proposer will be working on getting there stage by stage. More consideration on the considerations highlighted on my previous comments about adoption of the coin and education of blovkchain technology needs to be on investors mind when jumping onboard a project as proposed.

solution: We are proposing a tokenized network built on the Cardano blockchain, where anyone can invest in the property at any level, worldwide.
